main.name: Geovany Cardoza
main.description: With a Web Development Certificate from the University of Pennsylvania. Born in Puerto Rico, But currently living in Philadelphia, PA since 2015.
main.bio: When I first went to college in 2011,It was an institute call ICPR Junior College that prepares you for the CompTIA A+ exams,the computer technician certification. That's where my passion started to grow. Once I saw that, I have the skill of learning things quickly. I decided to take one step further, the IT field has always been my passion. Having a background as a computer hardware and repair technician, I started to get  interested in coding.Then I said to my self you need to get to the other level. So I went to the University of Pennsylvania coding Bootcamp where I became a Full-Stack Web  Developer. I consider my self a team player having experience working with different teams in different types of roles and backgrounds.

education.description: Full Stack Web Developer, MERN Stack, 12 weeks intensive program.
Computer Technician, hardware and software repair and maintenance.

work.title: Warehouse Associate
work.description: Order picker, Team leader, forklift driver, loading and unloading

projects.title: EmployeeDirectory
projects.category: This app utilizes an API to populate random users and then create a directory. Other users on the app can search for employees by 'name' and also organize each field (Name, Email, DOB) in ascending or descending order.

projects.title: WorkOutTracker
projects.category: The goal for this assignment is to create a full stack workout tracker web application that will allow a user to keep track of their workout regime by using MongoDB and Mongoose schema for database creation/management and Express for handling routes.
